entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mentioned as a person in the text, specifically with a tone of resentment.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, mentioned as being born under Saturn and having dark hair.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: A professor who is irritated that Harry isn't riveted by her news about his birth.

entities.name: saturn
entities.description: Mentioned as the planet under which Harry was born.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who turns his laugh into a hacking cough.

relationships.description: Mad-Eye Moody has resentment in his voice towards Harry.
Professor Trelawney is irritated that Harry isn't riveted by her news about his birth.
